error.invalid_powersensor: The powersensor provided is not reachable or wrong type  (state must be numeric)
error.invalid_nonhours: You must provide at least one hour per day when charger is available. Nonhours is currently set as every hour.

abort.already_configured: This integration has already been configured

override_nonhours.name: Enable Peaqev
override_nonhours.description: Will override non-hours for the set amount of hours. Default per call is to add one hour. Note that this service will not keep state on reboot.

hours.name: Hours
hours.description: The number of hours you wish to add to the override.

scheduler_set.name: Set Peaqev Scheduler
scheduler_set.description: Set a one-time schedule to help Peaqev optimize the cheapest hours for your desired charge-amount. Does not work with Peaqev-lite.

charge_amount.name: Charge amount
charge_amount.description: The number of kWh you wish to charge within the session

departure_time.name: Departure time
departure_time.description: The datetime you wish to depart from the charger

schedule_starttime.name: Schedule start time
schedule_starttime.description: Optional. The datetime you wish for the schedule to begin. Must be less than the departure-time, else it will default to the time of service call.

override_settings.name: Override settings
override_settings.description: Optional, set to True if you want to let Peaqev ignore your max-price and possibly peak-level during this scheduled session.

scheduler_cancel.name: Cancel Peaqev Scheduler
scheduler_cancel.description: Will cancel the previously set scheduled charge.

override_charge_amount.name: Override Max Charge Amount
override_charge_amount.description: Override the scheduled charge amount (requires price-awareness). Will be active during one session.

desired_charge_amount.name: Desired charge amount
desired_charge_amount.description: The number of kWh you wish to charge within the session. Set to 0 to disable override.

update_peaks_history.name: Update peaks history
update_peaks_history.description: Update the peaks history with old values. Remember to use the observed peak, ie if you have multiple peaks in your area, use the lowest of your top-peaks for the month.

import_dictionary.name: Dictionary to import
import_dictionary.description: The observed peaks for each month you would like to import.

update_current_peaks.name: Update current peaks
update_current_peaks.description: Use this call only if you have faulty values registered and need to override the peak-calcuations.

import_dictionary.name: Dictionary to import
import_dictionary.description: The observed peak(s) for the month you would like to override. Make sure you check the example value and update properly according to your locale.
